title: Blended Classroom-Based Professional Community Learning Practice Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and professional field practical experience
context.additional_context: Customized blended learning design for professionals in a smart device-centric limited technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can improve blended learning projects by exchanging peer feedback according to CoP (Community of Practice) principles.
Learners can design blended learning models applicable to real professional work environments using mobile-based tools.
Over eight weeks, learners can identify and propose improvements for at least three structural/cultural issues encountered during learning through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
